txt.en:
'I have recently noticed a strangely large number of gredbyg who seem to consistently linger around a set of doors to the south-east, at a place called the Chittering Hole within the Redhorn Lodes.

'I do not know what they are protecting -- or looking for, if not protecting -- but I believe that if a giant bug wants something, I should prevent it from obtaining whatever that is. Call me queer if you like, but I maintain that this is wisdom.

'How about you go disrupt their gathering a little? Head to the Chittering Hole, south-east of here, and defeat some of them. Hopefully, they will retreat.'
'I take it this means there are fewer gredbyg around those doors? Excellent! But they kept returning you say? I do wonder what they want there....'
'I have never heard of bugs defending a door before...perhaps a nest or food, but never a door.'
Auti has noticed an unusually large number of gredbyg who seem to be protecting a doorway.
Defeated gredbyg at the Chittering Hole ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat gredbyg at the Chittering Hole ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

The gredbyg are stirring at the Chittering Hole, south-east of the Orc-watch.\n\nAuti is curious as to why so many gredbyg are gathering outside a door. He asked you to defeat several and see if the rest scatter or remain.
Talk to Auti at the Orc-watch
Auti is at the Orc-watch, north-west of the Chittering Hole.\n\nAuti will be intrigued to hear that the gredbyg returned and defended the doors.
